page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content:
{Holywood Primary School} is the only school within the area. At present the school ,built as a three teacher unit, with a roll of 80, has a roll of 31 pupils taught by two teachers. They are also served by four visiting specialist teachers of, Art, Music, Physical Education and Remedial. The School has its own kitchen, cooking meals on the premises There are two part-time cleaners. Children of Secondary age are zoned to transfer to Maxwelltown High School.
The School replaced a much earlier building which is now owned by the Winifred Keswick Trust which converted it into four units,later extended to six units of free housing for pension- ers.{(See also page 13)
